channel.title: Visual-Studio on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in Visual-Studio on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 27: Visual Studio 2022 - with Kendra Havens
item.description: Not long to go until the release of both .NET 6 and Visual Studio 2022! But if you can’t wait that long - the preview releases of both can be downloaded right now! In this episode, I was joined by Kendra Havens to chat about what’s new and coming! Kendra is a Program Manager on the .NET and Visual Studio team, and we also chatted a bit in this episode about what software development is like internally at Microsoft, and learn that Microsoft face the same struggles as most other companies! We’re all human after all!
